title: Act 2005 (No. 26 of 2005), it is specified that the Minister for Social Protection
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Social Welfare (Section 290A)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Social Welfare (Section 290A) 

(Agreement) Order 2022. 

Budgeting in relation to certain rent payments
text_norm: 1 order may cited social welfare (section 290a) (agreement) order 2022 budgeting relation certain rent payment

title: Act 2005 (No. 26 of 2005), it is specified that the Minister for Social Protection
heading: 2. For the purposes of section 290A(3) (inserted by section 15 of the
text_raw:
2. For the purposes of section 290A(3) (inserted by section 15 of the 
Social Welfare Act 2012 (No. 43 of 2012)) of the Social Welfare Consolidation 
Act 2005 (No. 26 of 2005), it is specified that the Minister for Social Protection 
has entered into an agreement with An Post, and the period for which that 
agreement has effect is the period beginning on 1 January 2023 and ending on 
31 December 2023. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

1 December, 2022. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS, 

Minister for Social Protection. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 6th December, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [617] 3

title: Act 2005 (No. 26 of 2005), it is specified that the Minister for Social Protection
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

Section 15 of the Social Welfare Act 2012 extended the Household Budgeting 
facility for social welfare recipients by introducing new provisions specific to 
local authority rents. Under these provisions a new household budgeting 
arrangement was introduced whereby tenants of a housing authority or housing 
body who are in receipt of a social welfare payment could agree to have a 
portion of their social welfare payment withheld and paid to a local authority in 
respect of their rent. 

Social Welfare (Section 290A) (Agreement) Order 2022 specifies that the 
Minister for Social Protection has entered into an agreement with An Post for 
the purposes of carrying out this household budgeting arrangement and that 
this agreement will have effect from 1 January 2023 to 31 December 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [617]
